name: >cheater
description:
It's hard to define this game. It's a mix of platforming and bullet hell.

You can, and you must, use cheats to beat the game.

  • God Mode
  • Noclip
  • Wallhack
  • Bullet time (slow motion)
  • B.A.N. (Big Ass Nuke)

It was made in 2018 as a university project, in less than 2 months.

Before playing you must know that:

  • It will crash (it's programmed to do so)
  • It's not perfect (it's a beginner's work)
  • The difficulty can be pretty hard at times

Full gameplay here:
